page.description: You may control access to a control of a Grid or UX component, or a menu entry of a Navigation System Component by specifying which groups are permitted to see it.

section.title: Field Security in a UX Component

step.description: Select the control in the Selected Controls list.
Click the '...' button in the Row Properties > Security Groups property to display the Permissions dialog.
Check the groups that will be granted access and click OK to continue.

section.title: Field Security in a Grid Component

step.description: Select the control in the Selected Controls list.
Click the '...' button in the Column Properties > Security Groups property to display the Permissions dialog.
Check the groups that will be granted access and click OK to continue.

section.title: Menu Access in a Navigation Sytem Component
section.description: When defining a Navigation System Component:

step.description: Click the '...' button in the Node Settings > Security Groups property to display the Permissions dialog.
Check the groups that will be granted access and click OK to continue.

page.limitations: Check the groups that will be granted access and click OK to continue.
